description: Manage report within a given AzureStackHCI cluster configuration profile assignment.

commands.name: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster report list
commands.summary: List reports within a given AzureStackHCI cluster configuration profile assignment.
commands.syntax:
az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster report list --assignment-name
                                                                   --cluster-name
                                                                   --resource-group
examples: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster report list --assignment-name default -g {rg} --cluster-name {cluster_name}

commands.name: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster report show
commands.summary: Get information about a report associated with a AzureStackHCI cluster configuration profile assignment run.
commands.syntax:
az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster report show [--assignment-name]
                                                                   [--cluster-name]
                                                                   [--ids]
                                                                   [--name]
                                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                                   [--subscription]
examples: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster report show -n {report_name} --assignment-name default -g {rg} --cluster-name {cluster_name}
